title: Smart Data Models - VsConverter
description: Adapted from CIM data models. DC side of the voltage source converter (VSC).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be VsConverter

CapabilityCurve.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. All converters with this capability curve. Default: None

delta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Angle between uf and uc. Converter state variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0

droop.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Droop constant; pu value is obtained as D [kV^2 / MW] x Sb / Ubdc^2. Default: 0.0

droopCompensation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Compensation (resistance) constant. Used to compensate for voltage drop when controlling voltage at a distant bus. Default: 0.0

maxModulationIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The max quotient between the AC converter voltage (Uc) and DC voltage (Ud). A factor typically less than 1. VSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

maxValveCurrent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The maximum current through a valve. This current limit is the basis for calculating the capability diagram. VSC  configuration data. Default: 0.0

pPccControl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kind of control of real power and/or DC voltage. Default: None

qShare.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power sharing factor among parallel converters on Uac control. Default: 0.0

targetQpcc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power injection target in AC grid, at point of common coupling. Default: 0.0

targetUpcc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage target in AC grid, at point of common coupling. Default: 0.0

uf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Filter bus voltage. Converter state variable, result from power flow. Default: 0.0
